Detailed Description

Contains the method to merge tibia maps.

Member Function Documentation

static bool Tibia.Util.MapMerger.Merge ( Constants.ServerType  serverType,
string  outputDirectory,
params string[]  inputDirectories 
) [static]

Merges tibia maps together. The input files are only read from.

Parameters:
serverType The type of server (Real or OT)
outputDirectory The directory where the merged maps will go.
inputDirectories A list of directories that contain the tibia maps to be merged together.
Returns:
Returns true if successful. If it returns false the files in the output directory may be corrupted and incorrect.
